name: C_OBJECT
documentation: Abstract model of constraint on any kind of object node.

rm_type_name.name: rm_type_name
rm_type_name.documentation: Reference model type that this node corresponds to.

occurrences.name: occurrences
occurrences.documentation: Occurrences of this object node in the data, under the owning attribute. Upper limit can only be greater than 1 if owning attribute has a cardinality of more than 1).

node_id.name: node_id
node_id.documentation:
Semantic identifier of this node, used to dis-tinguish sibling nodes. All nodes must have a node_id; for nodes under a container C_ATTRIBUTE, the id must be an id-code must be defined in the archetype terminolo-gy. For valid structures, all node ids are id-codes.
For C_PRIMITIVE_OBJECTs, it will have the special value Primitive_node_id.
